definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
to confine/to lock up/to pen in
circle/ring/loop/classifier for loops, orbits, laps of race etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to surround/to circle

pinyin: Jin3 cou4 Miao3 zi3 Xian4 quan1

sentences.english: FIG. 6 is a top view of an induction coil of the present invention.
sentences.chinese: 图六为本发明的一个感应线圈的侧视图。

sentences.english: They plopped each turtle into a small pool surrounded by magnetic coils.
sentences.chinese: 他们把每个海龟放进有磁线圈围绕的小池子里。

sentences.english: The transformer has a primary coil and a secondary coil.
sentences.chinese: 变压器有一个初级线圈和次级线圈。

sentences.english: The transformer has a primary coil and a secondary coil.
sentences.chinese: 变压器有一个初级线圈和次级线圈。

sentences.english: Available either single or double solenoid, AC or DC operated with aluminum bodies.
sentences.chinese: 可无论是单或双线圈，交流或直流操作与铝体。

sentences.english: This system can be extended to realize the multi-center data acquisition, and the measurement of many-headed ignition coil.
sentences.chinese: 将此系统进行扩展可实现多头点火线圈的测试。

sentences.english: The coil is a wound conductive wire having a cross-section of rectangular-shape.
sentences.chinese: 线圈是通过卷绕截面为扁平形状的导线而得到的。

sentences.english: When the solenoid coil is energized, oil in the tin-loader chamber flows to the low stage.
sentences.chinese: 当电磁线圈通电时，油中的锡装载机分庭流向低阶段。

sentences.english: When the coils come off the winding machine, they are fairly loose, and delicate.
sentences.chinese: 当线圈脱落的缠绕机，它们是相当松散的，而微妙的。

sentences.english: Front suspension is by MacPherson struts, with coil springs and an anti-roll bar.
sentences.chinese: 前悬挂是麦花臣支柱与线圈，弹簧和防滚杆。

sentences.english: The iron was magnetized by passing electricity through wire wound round it.
sentences.chinese: 这块铁因绕在上面的线圈通了电而有磁性。

sentences.english: The circuit starts with a large litz spider coil.
sentences.chinese: 电路由一个大型的李兹线蛛网线圈开始。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, vehicle speeds cannot be directly measured by single-loop detectors.
sentences.chinese: 然而，交通速度并不能直接从单线圈检测器测量出来。

sentences.english: None of these fabrics is woven or knitted.
sentences.chinese: 这种线圈结构让针织布比梭织布更有弹性。

sentences.english: Disconnect the secondary spark plug cable from the ignition coil.
sentences.chinese: 从点火线圈上拆下辅助火星塞电缆。

sentences.english: The tongs grips one wall of the coil.
sentences.chinese: 这款抓手一次能握住一个线圈壁。
